verses.verse: Let every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> be subject <S%G5293><s%> to the higher <S%G5242><s%> powers. <S%G1849><s%> For there is no <S%G3756><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> but of God: <S%G2316><s%> the powers <S%G1849><s%> that be are ordained <S%G5021><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Whoever <S%G3588><s%> therefore <S%G5620><s%> resists <S%G498><s%> the power, <S%G1849><s%> resists <S%G436><s%> the ordinance <S%G1296><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and they that resist <S%G436><s%> shall receive <S%G2983><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> damnation. <S%G2917><s%>

For rulers <S%G758><s%> are not a terror <S%G5401><s%> to good <S%G18><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> but to the evil. <S%G2556><s%> Will <S%G2309><s%> you then <S%G1161><s%> not be afraid <S%G5399><s%> of the power? <S%G1849><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> that which is good, <S%G18><s%> and you shall have <S%G2192><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> of the same: <S%G846><s%>

For he is the minister <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to you for good. <S%G18><s%> But if <S%G1437><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> that which is evil, <S%G2556><s%> be afraid; <S%G5399><s%> for he bears <S%G5409><s%> not the sword <S%G3162><s%> in vain: <S%G1500><s%> for he is the minister <S%G1249><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> a revenger <S%G1558><s%> to execute wrath <S%G3709><s%> on him that does <S%G4238><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%>
Why <S%G1352><s%> you must needs <S%G318><s%> be subject, <S%G5293><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> for wrath, <S%G3709><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> for conscience <S%G4893><s%> sake.

For for this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> pay <S%G5055><s%> you tribute <S%G5411><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%> for they are God's <S%G2316><s%> ministers, <S%G3011><s%> attending <S%G4342><s%> continually <S%G4342><s%> on this <S%G5124><s%> very <S%G846><s%> thing.

Render <S%G591><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> their dues: <S%G3782><s%> tribute <S%G5411><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> tribute <S%G5411><s%> is due; <S%G514><s%> custom <S%G5056><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> custom; <S%G5056><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> fear; <S%G5401><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> honor. <S%G5092><s%>

Owe <S%G3784><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> any <S%G3367><s%> thing, but to love <S%G25><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another: <S%G240><s%> for he that loves <S%G25><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> has fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

For this, <S%G3588><s%> You shall not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> You shall not kill, <S%G5407><s%> You shall not steal, <S%G2813><s%> You shall not bear <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> witness, <S%G5576><s%> You shall not covet; <S%G1937><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G1536><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> commandment, <S%G1785><s%> it is briefly <S%G346><s%> comprehended <S%G346><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> namely, <S%G1722><s%> You shall love <S%G25><s%> your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G1438><s%>

Love <S%G26><s%> works <S%G2038><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> ill <S%G2556><s%> to his neighbor: <S%G4139><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> love <S%G26><s%> is the fulfilling <S%G4138><s%> of the law. <S%G3551><s%>

And that, knowing <S%G1492><s%> the time, <S%G2540><s%> that now <S%G2236><s%> it is high time <S%G5610><s%> to awake <S%G1453><s%> out of sleep: <S%G5258><s%> for now <S%G3568><s%> is our salvation <S%G4991><s%> nearer <S%G1452><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we believed. <S%G4100><s%>

The night <S%G3571><s%> is far spent, <S%G4298><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> is at <S%G1448><s%> hand: <S%G1448><s%> let us therefore <S%G3767><s%> cast <S%G656><s%> off <S%G659><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and let us put <S%G1746><s%> on <S%G1746><s%> the armor <S%G3696><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

Let us walk <S%G4043><s%> honestly, <S%G2156><s%> as in the day; <S%G2250><s%> not in rioting <S%G2970><s%> and drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> not in chambering <S%G2845><s%> and wantonness, <S%G766><s%> not in strife <S%G2054><s%> and envying. <S%G2205><s%>

But put <S%G1746><s%> you on <S%G1746><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and make <S%G4160><s%> not provision <S%G4307><s%> for the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> to fulfill the lusts <S%G1939><s%> thereof.
